job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a front-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers. The functionality you'll be building will introduce state-of-the-art concepts around a revolutionary technology. Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business will be the major focus. Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value. A few key aspects were looking for in you as a front-end engineer are:

   The concept of Generative AI, as well as the products you'll be building are considered state-of-the-art. You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers in a highly dynamic environment constantly looking to deliver new functionality to increase customer adoption and product market fit.
job_details.full_text:
Front End Developer

As a front-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers. The functionality you'll be building will introduce state-of-the-art concepts around a revolutionary technology. Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business will be the major focus. Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value. A few key aspects were looking for in you as a front-end engineer are:

   The concept of Generative AI, as well as the products you'll be building are considered state-of-the-art. You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers in a highly dynamic environment constantly looking to deliver new functionality to increase customer adoption and product market fit.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on front-end development and user interface aspects, with a mention of 'generative AI' as the underlying technology. However, it lacks details on core AI engineering tasks such as model development, fine-tuning, RAG implementation, or MLOps. The primary focus is on exposing existing functionality to customers and exploring new interfaces, which aligns more with traditional software development or a role that consumes AI services rather than builds them. Therefore, it does not fit the criteria for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer and is classified as Ambiguous.

job_tasks.justification: The role focuses on 'exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers' and 'building' functionality, which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'building will introduce state-of-the-art concepts' implies the development of new features or applications.

The role aims to make 'generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business', indicating a need to understand business context and translate technology for business use.
job_tasks.phrase: Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'generative AI' and 'state-of-the-art concepts around a revolutionary technology', implying an interaction with or exposure of generative AI models, though not necessarily building them from scratch.
job_tasks.phrase: state-of-the-art concepts around a revolutionary technology

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'concept of Generative AI' directly refers to the domain of generative models.
The goal to 'ensure customer adoption and value' and 'increase customer adoption and product market fit' highlights a focus on business outcomes and market needs.
Working 'closely with product management' indicates a need to understand business requirements and product strategy.
The role involves working with 'back-end engineers', suggesting integration and development of software systems.

While not explicitly stated, 'customizable around the domain of a specific business' might imply some level of data handling or preparation for the generative AI models, though this is a weak inference.
job_tasks.phrase: customizable around the domain of a specific business

soft_skills.phrase: working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers
increase customer adoption and product market fit
